attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app took 1 WHOLE MONTH to download and when I opened it my phone started glitching then it just shut off and I was never able to turn it back on so I had to get a NEW PHONE. It also made a screeching noise and that caused me and my entire family to pass out and when we woke up there were gross and huge bugs surrounding us and I had passed out again because of my hate towards bugs so I ended up in the ER room and I also downloaded this app on my iPad and it also glitched so hard that my iPad also never turned on. THIS APP SHOULD BE REMOVED!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: the most disappointing app ever ❗️❗️
attributes.review:
when i opened the app i saw a bunch of Cheetos all over my screen! I then proceeded to launch my phone into the air and out of the window so all the Cheetos on my phone can die of ugliness! It was orange, wrinkly, and it also talked and was super dumb and stupid abt everything! IT EVEN DIDNT KNOW HOW UGLY AND HORRIBLE IT WAS! My phone was sitting outside on the grass and i saw a dog pooping on it! He knew the app sucked too! I then see an orange man tht goes by the name of trump take it and hide in a bunker! 
Anyways, DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL CURSE U WITH UGLY CHEETOS AND ORANGES 🍊 AND U MAY ALSO GET  DUMBER THAN A STICK! so please 😉 don’t download it cuz i fkin hate it ✨😚

attributes.title: in the coffin now👁👄👁
attributes.review: THIS APP HAD THE AUDACITY TO MURDER LIVESSSSSS, my pet rock had to suffer😡he had to go to THERAPY FOR 2 YEARRSSS🥶what a terrible app🐇i can’t even think straight anymore😢stream stay gold by bts🤩stan seventeen n stream left & right 🥰stream play by chungha😳those songs helped my pet rock ręćøvër😣this app is jus disgusting, horrible, why do we even need it😫 i’ll write a jk fanfic😰 “once you and jk walk into his mansion, he closes and locks the door behind you n pins you to the wall. he gets close to your ear and whispers ‘ i told you not to wear that dress, but you disobeyed me, you know what happens when you disobey me” end of fanfic🤯🤯

attributes.title: MAKE IT STOP
attributes.review: I opened the app when... 😭😭 I saw it Trump was standing in my room and he left a trail of orange racism,white supremacy and homophobia EVERYWHERE😭😭🍤 it was HORRID. 🥺🥕 but that was when I saw him walking slow obviously because I mean he is slow at everything NEXT THING I KNOW Pence is there too it was THE 💰 worst thing ever he was on my toilet 🚽 taking a phat dump when I closed the app it all stopped 📱 I just wanted to support our president 😭💗💞🍤 but then this happened well America 🇺🇸 you’ve lost my vote 🗳 😭 this app is horrible don’t waste your time reading the 5 star reviews they’re trolls😭😭

attributes.title: very disappointed😔
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrendous! I downloaded this app in order to support our wonderful president but it took 5 months to download ! Once it downloaded the app caused a lot of problems . First my hair started falling out , then my dog got sick and then my cousins neighbors sister died from drinking bleach because she was trying to protect herself from corona (I don’t know where she got that absurd information from). Once I deleted the app my hair grew back , my dog returned to health and my cousins neighbors sister returned from the dead! To make a long story short....very bad app.

attributes.title: trump 2020🧚🏻‍♀️but Simpson’s edition💅🏻
attributes.review: my mom does support trump for some odd reason but don’t worry I’ll snap her out of that trance. He’s a disgusting human being who is a pediophile. So if you support him, you support racism and pedos, that says a lot you know. Imagine one of the little kids was your daughter 😐. Stop talking nonsense. It’s really sad to see adults making all these decisions for us when they don’t know any better. Can’t wait till we’re the adults cause we actually care for what’s right. No justice no peace. Muslim lives matter. Hispanic lives matter. No more stolen sisters. SAY THEIR NAMES.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is terrible and caused my iPhone 11 64gb with Apple Care+ 1 year warranty to blow up!!!!😡😡😡😡 I would not suggest this to anybody who would like to keep their phone. It also turned all of my contacts into racist confederate soldiers 🙄🙄🙄 and removed all the black contacts from my phone 😪😪😪. I was finally able to delete the app after it kept telling my other apps to leave it they don’t like it here and kept sending me notifications about how all apps matter.😤😤😤😤😤 Terrible app would give it 0 or even -1 if I could 😞😞😞

attributes.title: It’s not worth it
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was immediately slammed with child pornographic images as videos on my screen. I was disgusted and didn’t know what to do. But I love Trump so much so I excuse that and went on with the app. later I discovered someone trying to talk to me through the app saying that if I don’t comply with them they would come to my house and kill me. When that happened I couldn’t stay on. This is beyond me and I hope this app gets talking down. No one and I mean no one deserves to see and experience what I have went through.

attributes.title: As dory said "just keep swimming” 💅🤩🧚‍♀️✨ but i think it’s best if you drown 💖🌈🌸🦋
attributes.review:
this app took ages to download and when it did, even my sleep paralysis demon left. My dog started talking to me in korean and my fish were drowning at the casino. I think it’s best if you✨🧚 𝓈𝒽𝓊𝓉 𝓊𝓅✨🧚 and not run for president again Donald trumpet🧚✨🌍❤️ you should honestly be getting arrested for all the illegal stuff that you’ve done to people and WHOLE FAMILIES but since you’re the “president” you can “get away with anything”??🧐🥶

attributes.title: What the?????
attributes.review: I cannot believe how terrible this app is!!! I got it today and while scrolling through I realized it was not a trump version of subway surfer! I was very disappointed to say the least... but I thought well maybe there are other games! But NO! There are NO GAMES on this app, the only thing funny about it is the guy Donald Trump that the whole app seems to be situated around! He seems like an absolute joke! Anyways, Arrest the cops that killed Breonna Taylor, ACAB, defund the police, and give trans people living rights please! If they fix all of those things I may reconsider buying.
